page.title: 13The Y.M.C.A. by Adrian Dee
page.content: On Monday night I go to the{Y.M.C.A.}I walk to the Y.M. about 6 o'clock. When I get in, I go and hang my coat up. They have{Space Invaders, pinball, {football and pool.}They all cost ten pence.We play on the games from half six to seven.Then we have a meeting to tell us what we going to do.First of all they tell us about the{fun {raising activities,}then we play.We sometimes have a{roller disco.}Then we have a tuck shop, where we sell sweets and pop.After that we normally go and play in the{pool handicap.}They start off with eight people, when the last game is played, the winner gets a trophy. After that we play{football for half an hour. When the football finishes, we have a disco. At nine o'clock we go home.
